title: Taliban announce women must cover faces in public, say burqa is best
content:
1. Taliban announce women must cover faces in public, say burqa is best  Reuters.com
  2. Taliban decree orders women in Afghanistan to cover their faces  CNN
  3. Afghanistan's Taliban order women to cover up head to toe  The Associated Press - en Español
  4. Taliban order all Afghan women to wear burqa  The Guardian
  5. Taliban orders Afghan women to cover their faces in public  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: タリバン、女性は公共の場で顔を隠すべきと発表、ブルカがベストと発言
塔利班宣布妇女在公共场合必须遮盖面部，称布卡是最佳选择
塔利班宣佈婦女在公共場合必須遮蓋面部，稱布卡是最佳選擇
